comments.html: Some great shows on this list! My goodness, The Nanny. Fran Drescher was so good! Schittâ€™s Creek is pretty great. I do recommend a rewatch.

I'm always curious about what people re-watch all the time. For me:

  • The Simpsons (less so now but watched it over and over in the past)
  • UK Office
  • Larry Sanders Show
  • The Thick of It
  • It's Always Sunny
  • Alan Partridge (any of the shows)
  • Curb
For a more recent comedy I've been loving rewatching What We Do in The Shadows's first few seasons. We've caught lots of little details.
